summary: Completed frontend testing of Iron Toxicity and NSAID Toxicity approaches in Children > Approaches section. All 8 test cases passed successfully.
passed_tests: Iron Toxicity appears in dropdown and renders with elemental iron calculator
Iron Toxicity calculator: Ferrous Sulfate (20%), 650mg, 10kg patient = 130mg elemental = 13 mg/kg (correctly shows 'Low risk')
Iron Toxicity shows toxic dose thresholds (<20 mg/kg low, 20-60 mg/kg mild, ≥60 mg/kg serious)
NSAID Toxicity appears in dropdown and renders with NSAID dose calculator
NSAID calculator: Ibuprofen, 10 tablets of 200mg, 10kg patient = 2000mg = 200 mg/kg (moderate toxicity)
NSAID shows special warning for Mefenamic Acid requiring 24h observation (with ⚠️ icon)
Search keywords work: 'ibuprofen' -> NSAID Toxicity, 'ferrous' -> Iron Toxicity, 'deferoxamine' -> Iron Toxicity
Activated charcoal dose calculation displays for NSAID (1g/kg, max 50g) - shows 10g for 10kg patient
critical_code_review_comments: IronToxicityApproach component is well-structured with proper elemental iron calculation logic
Iron salt percentages correctly implemented: Ferrous Sulfate 20%, Ferrous Gluconate 12%, Ferrous Fumarate 33%, Carbonyl Iron 100%
NSAIDToxicityApproach component properly implements dose calculator with tablets x strength calculation
Mefenamic Acid and Phenylbutazone correctly flagged with 24h observation warning
NSAID toxic dose thresholds correctly implemented: <100 mg/kg low, 100-400 moderate, >400 severe
Search keywords properly configured in ApproachesPage.jsx for both approaches
data-testid attributes properly implemented: iron-salt-selector, iron-amount-input, nsaid-selector, nsaid-tablets-input, nsaid-amount-input
Both components properly receive weight prop from parent ApproachesPage and use it for calculations
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iron Toxicity and NSAID Toxicity approaches are fully functional in Children > Approaches section. Navigation: Login > Dashboard > Children card > Approaches card (or direct URL /children/approaches). Iron Toxicity includes: Elemental Iron Calculator with 6 iron salt types, Toxic Dose Thresholds, Clinical Stages of Iron Poisoning, Serum Iron Interpretation, Deferoxamine Protocol. NSAID Toxicity includes: NSAID Dose Calculator with 10 NSAID types, Toxic Dose Thresholds, Clinical Manifestations, Management Protocol, Disposition Guidelines. Search keywords: Iron - iron, ferrous, sulfate, gluconate, fumarate, deferoxamine, desferal, chelation, poisoning, overdose, elemental iron. NSAID - nsaid, ibuprofen, naproxen, diclofenac, advil, motrin, aleve, mefenamic, ponstan, indomethacin, ketorolac, poisoning, overdose.
